name: RFG - Robotic Flower Growth
description:
Help the robot to grow a flower.

Submission to the Godot Wild Jam #36.

W, D or left and right to rotate camera.

Click with mouse to navigate.

  • Fill bucket with water at the well.
  • Navigate to the flower.
  • Don't step outside the path, or you will trip and drop some water.
  • Water the flower.
  • Watch the flower grow.
  • Repeat...

It started with the idea of a robot and a flower, which did sound like a good approach. The flower can grow uncontrollably I guess :).

The setup and goal of the project:

  • 3D game.
  • Point and click navigation.
  • A couple of different animations.
  • HTML5

 It also became an excuse to dive into the animationtree of the Godot engine.

3D models, animation, codebase = Done

Game loop...?

... Water the flower and it grows? Good enough for the time that was left I guess.

Enjoy

Software used:

  • Godot Engine
  • Blender
  • 3D Coat
  • Affinity Photo
